entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WATCH , Goderich
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:22 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries at times heavy or snow squalls. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy and local snow squalls. Blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 7:06 PM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
